@DHSCgovuk @CMO_England @PHE_uk @NHSEngland @scotgovhealth @CMOWales @PublicHealthW @healthdpt @publichealthni #COVID19 has increased #suicide risk (eg due to separation, isolation, anxiety, job/business loss, financial crisis, trauma of not being with loved ones when they die) so #suicides likely to rise over coming months - unless we invest more in #SuicidePrevention NOW!
